sentence.Network_en: Payola is the oil on which the political machine runs.
sentence.Network_cn: 贿赂是政治机器运转的润滑油.

sentence.Network_en: The announcer was fired for taking payola.
sentence.Network_cn: 播音员因接受贿赂而被解雇了.

sentence.Network_en: I am the program director of my radio station, so where's my payola?
sentence.Network_cn: 我是广播电台的节目导演, 那我的贿赂在哪?

PerfectNetExp.abs: fantod的翻译查词例句词组大耳朵英语 ... gynecocracy 妇女当政... payola 贿赂 ... remoteness 远离, 远隔, 微少.

RelatedPhrase.word: The payola was direct-deposited from one label to another

list.key: The payola was direct-deposited from one label to another
list.abs: ...双方协商同意购买一张专辑的的版权并具有第二张专辑的厂牌选择权,然后发生了什么,贿赂迅速从一个厂牌到另一个厂牌沉积下来,The payola was direct-deposited from one label to another,钱和销售的唱片源源不断地流进,Bella Union签下了高达36支乐队,这包括来自Nova S.

derivation.yuyuan_name: 1930s: from pay + -ola as in Victrola, the name of a make of gramophone

entry.tran: （唱片公司对电台的）商业贿赂
entry.def: Payola is the illegal practice of paying radio broadcasters to play certain CDs, so that the CDs will become more popular and therefore make more profits for the record company.

means.word_mean: 1. a bribe given to a disc jockey to induce him to promote a particular record

auth_sentence.content: In the old days, so many songs on the Billboard charts became embedded in the popular memory, thanks to radio, payola, etc.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: In the old days, so many songs on the Billboard charts became embedded in the popular memory, thanks to radio, payola, etc.

auth_sentence.content: "We must be very careful, no payola," Julia wrote on her pad.
auth_sentence.res_content: "We must be very careful, no payola," Julia wrote on her pad.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: "We must be very careful, no payola," Julia wrote on her pad.
